actions.text: Amendment SA 299 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 76.
Amendment SA 299 proposed by Senator Reed. To ensure continued United States support for the Government of Ukraine to stand firm against aggression by the Government of Russia in Europe.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 299 proposed by Senator Reed.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 299 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 76.

purpose: To ensure continued United States support for the Government of Ukraine to stand firm against aggression by the Government of Russia in Europe.
